text: Helmstadt is a municipality in Würzburg in Bavaria in Germany. == Geography == === Municipal structure === Helmstadt has two districts: * Helmstadt * Holzkirchhausen === Neighboring municipalities === * Holzkirchen * Uettingen * Waldbüttelbrunn * Irtenberger Wald * Altertheim * Neubrunn * Wertheim == Twin towns == Helmstadt is twinned with: * Chiusi della Verna (Italy) == References == Category:Würzburg (district)
title: Helmstadt
